wikipedia_page.main: Henry Moram Matthew (16 April 1870 – 19 February 1956) was a Scottish footballer who played as a wing half in the English Football League for Bolton Wanderers and Preston North End. He also played in the Scottish League for Dundee, in the Southern League for Millwall Athletic and Watford, in the Irish League for Distillery, and in English non-league football for Darlington and Gravesend United. He played representative football for both the Southern League and Irish League teams.
